item.title: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising DLC character Wilnas release date to be announced on August 2
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5

EX characters playable at EVO 2025.

The release date for Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising Character Pass Season 2 downloadable content character Wilnas will be announced after the gam’s EVO 2025 finals on August 2, publisher Cygames and developer Arc System Works announced.

Here are the latest details, via Cygames:

Wilnas (voiced by Xander Mobus in English, Masaaki Mizunaka in Japanese)

Instead of dash attacks and triple attacks, Wilnas commands a variety of advancing skills to navigate in battle. He also excels from a distance, leveraging his exceptional reach to dominate the battlefield with devastating blows and pummel his foes with overwhelming force.

Maneuvering Wilnas

Believe in Hadron Smash! (Neutral + Skill)

Charge in with Volcanic Knee! (4 + Skill)

Height

Height: 210cm.

Weapon Skins

EX Characters

Playable at the Cygames [EVO 2025] booth! Press R1 while selecting Gran, Djeeta, or Narmaya on the character select screen.

New Costumes Coming Soon

Wilnas Trailer and Release Date Reveal on August 2

Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising is available now for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/granblue-fantasy-versus-rising-dlc-character-wilnas-release-date-to-be-announced-on-august-2

item.title: Rivals of Aether II adds Galvan on October 7
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Fighting game's fourth free additional character update.

Platform fighting game Rivals of Aether II will add Galvan, “The Ferrous Fossil,” as its fourth free additional character update on October 7, developer Aether Studios announced.

Rivals of Aether II is available now for PC via Steam.

Watch a new trailer and character showcase below.

Galvan Trailer

Galvan Showcase and Behind the Scenes



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/rivals-of-aether-ii-adds-galvan-on-october-7

item.title: Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage launches October 30 for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC; later for Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

An automatic update for the Steam version.

Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on October 30 for $19.99, followed by Switch 2 at a later date, publisher SEGA and developer Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio announced. A closed beta test will take place in early September.

Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. first launched for PC via Steam on January 28. The PC version will receive an automatic update to Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage at launch.

Users who own Virtua Fighter 5: Ultimate Showdown for PlayStation 4 can upgrade to Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage for a discounted price of $9.99, with all downloadable content carrying over.

A “30th Anniversary Edition” will also be available for $49.49, which includes the following additional content:

  • Downloadable content “Legendary Pack”
  • Downloadable content “Yakuza Series Pack”
  • Downloadable content “30th Anniversary Swimsuit Costume Set” (all characters)
  • Virtua Fighter Pre-Production Secret Materials
  • Virtua Fighter 30th Anniversary Music Selection
  • 30th Anniversary Ranking Titles

Pre-orders for any edition include the “SEGA Genesis Customization Item,” which is based on the SEGA hardware.

Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage introduces the new mode “World Stage”—a single-player mode where you battle through tournaments around the world. Legendary real-life players will appear as CPU opponents.

Additionally, Dural will join the game as a playable fighter via paid downloadable content, allowing players to control the game’s mysterious final boss. (It should be noted that Dural cannot be used in official tournaments.)

Here is a brief overview of the game, via SEGA:

Cross-play functionality lets you brawl it out with players on any platform.

Additionally, online matches will run more seamlessly than ever, thanks to rollback netcode, allowing you to engage in intense battles with opponents all over the world!

World Stage

In the all-new immersive single-player mode, you’ll travel the globe and compete in a massive tournament.

Along the way, you’ll encounter formidable foes, including CPUs based on world-renowned players.

Climb up the ranks and claim the title of world champion!

Watch a new trailer below.

Reveal Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/virtua-fighter-5-revo-world-stage-launches-october-30-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc-later-for-switch-2
